name: Cake Defense
description:
Kiyomi has a slice of cake, better make sure nothing happens to it. But where is Hara hiding?

Take on the role of the seeker in hide and seek, where you must try to find the other player before she reaches your cake.

On the other side, the hiding player must reach the cake without getting caught.

Totally inspired by some tiny Minecraft hide and seek videos.

Controls:
W - Move Forward
S - Move Back
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Spacebar - Jump
Mouse - Rotate/Look
